title: Change in potential energy when spring stretched

content.prompt: To stretch a certain nonlinear spring by an amount x requires a force F given by F = 40x â€“ 6x2 , where F is in newtons and x is in meters. What is the change in potential energy when the spring is stretched 2 meters from its equilibrium position?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
